title: MINETA: An Accessible Bitcoin Cloud Mining Solution
text:
Mining Bitcoin on your own can be a very expensive endeavor nowadays, as you need money, space, and time to set up a rig. But even after all that effort, it is not guaranteed that you will make substantial profits to cover your investment. MINETA Bitcoin Cloud Mining offers a convenient solution for those who want to mine Bitcoin without hassles and additional expenditures.

About MINETA

MINETA Bitcoin Cloud Mining is part of the Bitmain Technology Ltd. company, the world’s number one bitcoin hardware mining provider.

With backing from such an industry giant, it is no wonder that MINETA is a top producer in the cloud mining sector.

MINETA’s Bitcoin Cloud Mining Service wants to enable all users to participate in the crypto market and, as such, it offers crypto mining contracts at affordable prices with a small maintenance fee. This way, more crypto enthusiasts might be able to get involved in bitcoin mining without having to compromise their budget.

The firm acknowledges that cryptocurrencies have enormous potential for innovation, and to change the current financial world through their transfer and storage capabilities.

The company wants to help the crypto mining world advance into the mainstream by granting power to anyone to produce their own crypto. MINETA also provides a secure digital wallet in which the user can store and manage the bitcoin he has mined by using a number of exciting features.

The MINETA Bitcoin Cloud Mining Service enables the users to start bitcoin mining in just a few easy steps, with a minimum investment, low risk, and low fees.

The Team Behind MINETA

The project is led by the Bitmain team which comprises of tech experts that have developed and operated large scale data centers for decades. Their expertise allowed them to keep 99% uptime for their mining contracts since they launched MINETA. The company also applies only the highest of standards in security, so that all users’ funds and data are kept safe.

Data Centers All Over the World

MINETA has third-party Mining Farms located all across the world in order to make bitcoin mining easier and more lucrative. While the exchange locations have not been provided for obvious security reasons, through its partnership with Bitmain Technology Ltd., we know that some of their data centers are located in China, U.S.A., and Canada.

Regulatory Aspects

What Product Does MINETA Offer?

Customers are able to purchase SHA-256 Mining Power of the Bitmain Antminer S17, one of the latest bitcoin miners launched by Bitmain which still have a positive ROI (return of investment) by today’s hardware standards.

The contract is for two years and, during this time, there will be a maintenance fee of 5% which will cover the electricity, cooling, and repair costs that the hardware needs for proper functioning.

Whatever bitcoins you have made will be deposited into your MINETA wallet every 12 hours. The minimum hashrate that you can purchase is 1 TH/s at 40$.

The consumer will be able to withdraw from his wallet sums that are over 0.0005 BTC.

Payment Options

Users are currently only able to purchase the mining contract using Bitcoin.

Customers Support

The support team of the platform is very dedicated to solving any problems or answering any questions their clients might have. MINETA can be contacted at any time either by personal account (Dashboard › Account support) or through live chat.

Easy Affiliate Referrals

Users can also earn additional profits by referring new customers to the company. By sharing your referral link, you can earn between 5-20% of their hosting services and money contracts on any deposit made by the new clients you referred.

Conclusion

Nowadays, individual mining requires a substantial investment and tech-savvy expertise in order to deploy the mining hardware, as well as maintain it to optimal functions. MINETA simplifies the entire process and makes it accessible to mine for all users regardless of technical background.
